name: Space Burrito
description:
SPACE BURRITO - A MOOCHACHO GAME

On its incredible journey to attract new customers, the California Burrito flew from San Diego, in California, towards the island of Florianópolis, located in South America.
...But something went wrong over its spacial flight... All burrito ingredients got lost in space!!

You have a mission now: grab all the right ingredients to roll new California Burritos and bring them safely to their new destination!

Download at Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pixelsandfossils.spaceburrito
